summary: Now in his fifties, Vagn leads a solitary life and plays football with a group of similarly aged men, some even older. After being left behind at a petrol station by his teammates on their ... See full summary »
cast: Kristian Halken|Robert Hansen|Laura Christensen|Rasmus Bjerg|Leif Sylvester|Ole Thestrup|Elith Nulle Nykjær|Niels Skousen|Bodil Jørgensen|Ralph Carlsson|Shanti Roney|Nikolaj Steen|Tomas Radoor|Jörgen Berthage|Hans Brorson|Sally Mørk|Devran Orhan|Benjamin Scott|Henrik Sjöman
title: Oldboys
